message: I really like convore. Nice work! I'm curious how it will go on from here. Good luck! Oh, and btw: how do you plan to make money with converse?
And also I am not sure if mentions in the topic are registered or if only inside of messages. Would be nice if it worked everywhere :-)
Yes, Convore makes a nice first impression. Interesting would be to be able to add people to the friendlist, to have private messages, to be able to completely delete groups.
